                    Channel channel,
                    java.lang.String name,
                    java.lang.String description)
        Creates and persists a Server Package Profile for the given Server with the name and description.
        Parameters:
        type - ProfileType we want to create
        user - Logged in User
        channel - Channel that this Profile is created from
        name - Name of profile
        description - Profile description
        Returns:

      • comparePackageLists

        public static java.util.List comparePackageLists(DataResult profiles,
                                 DataResult systems,
                                 java.lang.String param)
        compares the given lists of Packages. NOTE: For lists that contain entries with the same package with multiple versions we show the entries as "OTHER_ONLY" when the version isn't on one of the other lists.
        Parameters:
        profiles - Packages to compare
        systems - Packages to compare
        param - comparison parameter
        Returns:
        List of differences

        Returns a DataResult with a diff of the server's packages and those in the profile.
        Parameters:

        sid1 - Server whose packages should be used in the comparison.
        orgid - Org owner
        pc - PageControl
        Returns:
        a DataResult with a diff of the server's packages and those in the profile.

      • syncToSystem

        public static PackageAction syncToSystem(User user,
                         java.lang.Long sid,
                         java.lang.Long sid1,
                         java.util.Set pkgIdCombos,
                         java.lang.String missingoption,
                         java.util.Date earliest)
        Syncs the given server id to the given profile id.
        Parameters:
        user - Current user
        sid - Server id to be affected.
        sid1 - Profile id to be used to sync.
        pkgIdCombos - Set of packages which will be synced.
        missingoption - Defines what do to if packages go missing. null means ask the user.
        earliest - The earliest Date to perform this action
        Returns:
        The PackageAction which was scheduled containing the sync information.

                          java.util.Date earliest)

        Parameters:
        user - Current user
        sid - Server id to be affected.
        prid - Profile id to be used to sync.
        pkgIdCombos - Set of packages which will be synced.
        missingoption - Defines what do to if packages go missing. null means ask the user.
        earliest - The earliest time to perform this action
        Returns:
        The PackageAction which was scheduled containing the sync information.

      • getChildChannelsNeededForProfile

        public static java.util.List getChildChannelsNeededForProfile(User user,
                                              Channel baseChannel,
                                              Profile profileIn)
        Get the List of child Channels of the passed in base Channel that contain the packages found in the Profile. This is useful if you want to compute the child channels required to be subscribed to in order to get a system to sync with a profile. This method iterates over *each* package in the profile and checks for the proper child channel. Can be expensive.
        Parameters:
        user - making the call
        baseChannel - to look for child channels for
        profileIn - to iterate over the set of packages for.
        Returns:
        List of Channel objects.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        profileId - The id of the profile the packages are associated with.
        Returns:

      • compatibleWithChannel

        public static DataResult<ProfileDto> compatibleWithChannel(Channel channelIn,
                                           Org orgIn,
                                           PageControl pc)
        Get the list of Profile's that are compatible with the given Base Channel ID passed in.
        Parameters:
        channelIn - that you want the list of Profiles against.
        orgIn - who owns the Profiles
        pc - PageControl to filter the list.
        Returns:
        DataResult containing ProfileDto objects
